title: Fog forecast for Bahawalpur
content:
BAHAWALPUR, Jan 11 (APP):The local Met Office has forecast dense fog and very cold weather for the city for the next 24 hours.
The highest maximum temperature 17 centigrade and the lowest minimum 07 centigrade were recorded during the last 24 hours.
The fog and very cold weather have also been forecast for the rest of the region
